problem.prob_desc:
26. 4개의 동전을 동시에 던져서 앞면이 나오는 동전의 개수를 확률변수 $X$라 하고, 이산확률변수 $Y$를 $$Y = \begin{cases} X & (X\text{가 0 또는 1의 값을 가지는 경우}) \\ 2 & (X\text{가 2 이상의 값을 가지는 경우}) \end{cases}$$라 하자. $\mathrm{E}(Y)$의 값은? [3점]
① $\dfrac{25}{16}$ ② $\dfrac{13}{8}$ ③ $\dfrac{27}{16}$ ④ $\dfrac{7}{4}$ ⑤ $\dfrac{29}{16}$

gpt-5-codex.title: X distribution from fair coins
gpt-5-codex.body: Four fair coins give a binomial distribution X ~ Binomial(n=4, p=1/2), so P(X=k) = C(4,k)/16 for k=0,...,4. Explicit values: P(0)=1/16, P(1)=4/16, P(2)=6/16, P(3)=4/16, P(4)=1/16.

gpt-5-codex.title: Translate to Y probabilities
gpt-5-codex.body: By definition, Y equals X for X=0 or 1, and Y=2 otherwise. Hence P(Y=0)=P(X=0)=1/16, P(Y=1)=P(X=1)=4/16, and P(Y=2)=P(X≥2)=1−(1/16+4/16)=11/16.

gpt-5.title: Express Y via X
gpt-5.body: With X = number of heads in 4 fair coin tosses, Y equals X for X=0 or 1, and Y=2 for X≥2. Thus Y takes values {0,1,2} with Y=0 if X=0, Y=1 if X=1, and Y=2 if X∈{2,3,4}.

gemini-3-pro.title: Calculate relevant probabilities for X
gemini-3-pro.body:
The random variable $X$ represents the number of heads obtained when tossing 4 coins. The total number of possible outcomes is $2^4 = 16$. We calculate the probabilities for the cases defined in $Y$:
- $P(X=0) = \frac{\binom{4}{0}}{16} = \frac{1}{16}$
- $P(X=1) = \frac{\binom{4}{1}}{16} = \frac{4}{16}$
- $P(X \ge 2) = 1 - \left( P(X=0) + P(X=1) \right) = 1 - \left( \frac{1}{16} + \frac{4}{16} \right) = \frac{11}{16}$

gemini-3-pro.title: Calculate the expected value E(Y)
gemini-3-pro.body:
Based on the definition of the random variable $Y$, the expected value $\mathrm{E}(Y)$ is calculated as follows:
$\mathrm{E}(Y) = 0 \cdot P(X=0) + 1 \cdot P(X=1) + 2 \cdot P(X \ge 2)$
Substitute the probabilities calculated in the previous step:
$\mathrm{E}(Y) = 0 \cdot \frac{1}{16} + 1 \cdot \frac{4}{16} + 2 \cdot \frac{11}{16}$
$\mathrm{E}(Y) = 0 + \frac{4}{16} + \frac{22}{16} = \frac{26}{16} = \frac{13}{8}$

grok-4-fast.title: Define X and its distribution
grok-4-fast.body: X is the binomial random variable for number of heads in 4 fair coin tosses, so X ~ Binomial(4, 0.5). Total outcomes: 2^4 = 16. P(X = k) = C(4,k) / 16, where C(4,k) is the binomial coefficient.

grok-4-fast.title: Define Y in terms of X
grok-4-fast.body: Y = X if X = 0 or 1; Y = 2 if X ≥ 2. Possible values of Y: 0, 1, 2.
